Package com.iontrading.mkv.bulkentitlements

Interface IMkvBulkEntitlementResourceStream

  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMembers
public interface IMkvBulkEntitlementResourceStream
    IMkvBulkEntitlementResourceStream is the stream of Resources that will be used by the Entitlement API to resolve any Bulk Query.
    The stream can be paused and resumed, depending on the congestion status of the Entitlement API engine: the pause() can be called by the Entitlement API in case the evaluation engine is overloaded and cannot accept new evaluation requests; the resume() will be called by the Entitlement API after the stream has been paused, to resume its normal activity.
    An additional method, cancel(), is provided to abort the current Bulk Entitlement Query. This typically happens when the request has been canceled by the remote client application.
    See Also:
    MkvEntitlementManager, IMkvESLibStatusListener, MkvESLibStatus, MkvEntitlementManager.startBulkQueryService(String, IMkvBulkEntitlementResourceStreamFactory), MkvEntitlementManager.publishQueryUserEntitlementsFunServer(com.iontrading.mkv.events.MkvFunctionListener), MkvEntitlementManager.bulkQuery(IMkvBulkEntitlementRequest, IMkvBulkEntitlementResourceStreamFactory, String, IMkvBulkEntitlementRequestListener), MkvBulkEntitlementRequest, IMkvBulkEntitlementResourceStreamFactory, IMkvBulkEntitlementResourceStream, IMkvBulkEntitlementResourceCallback, IMkvBulkEntitlementRequestListener, MkvBulkEntitlementQuery

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void cancel()
      This method will be called by the Entitlement API when the current Bulk Entitlement Query is aborted.
      void pause()
      This method is used to temporarily pause the Resource stream from sending additional data.
      void resume()
      This method will be called by the Entitlement API after the stream has been paused, to resume its normal activity.

    • Method Detail

      • pause

        void pause()
    throws UnsupportedOperationException
        This method is used to temporarily pause the Resource stream from sending additional data. The implementation is optional: having a proper implementation helps the Entitlement API to better handle cases of overloading and congestion.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • resume

        void resume()
     throws UnsupportedOperationException
        This method will be called by the Entitlement API after the stream has been paused, to resume its normal activity. The implementation is optional: having a proper implementation helps the Entitlement API to better handle cases of overloading and congestion.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        This method will be called by the Entitlement API when the current Bulk Entitlement Query is aborted. This typically happens when the request has been canceled by the remote client application.
